title: Teen shot and killed in Overland
content:
OVERLAND, MO (KTVI) - Police say a 15-year-old is dead after a shooting in the 9500 block of Page. The teen was shot at at his home at around 7:15pm. He was home alone with his three other brothers. Their parents were out for the evening.
Police believe this was an accidental shooting. Investigators have not revealed who shot the teen, or if the teen shot himself. It does not look like charges will be filed. Police do not believe there was criminal intent.
The parents were notified about the fatal shooting. They went to the hospital where the 15-year-old was taken.
